path: ./Audit_Reports_2024/Techrate/Jack Raffle Full Smart Contract Security Audit.pdf

findings.title: Owner can change the tax and liquidity fee
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to modify the tax and liquidity fees, which could lead to potential security risks.

findings.title: Owner can change the maximum transaction amount
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to modify the maximum transaction amount, which could lead to potential security risks.

findings.title: Owner can exclude from the fee
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to exclude certain addresses or transactions from paying fees.

findings.title: Owner can change raffle wallet address
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to modify the raffle wallet address, which could lead to unauthorized access or manipulation of funds.

findings.title: Owner can exclude from checking max transaction amount
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to exclude certain transactions from being checked against the maximum allowed transaction amount.

findings.title: Owner can reset some contract settings to default
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to reset certain contract settings to their default values.

findings.title: Owner can lock and unlock
findings.description: The owner has privileges to lock and unlock even after renouncing ownership.

findings.title: Owner can set minimum tokens to sell
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to set the minimum tokens required for selling.

findings.title: Owner can change liquidity parts
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to modify liquidity parts.

findings.title: Owner can change BNB parts
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to modify BNB parts.

findings.title: Owner can change threshHoldTopUpRate
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to change the threshold top-up rate.

findings.title: Owner can change reward cycle block
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to modify the reward cycle block.
